pullRequest.title: Fix natural filtering strategy for map events
pullRequest.bodyText:
closes #18104
see this test to have an idea about fix: https://github.com/hazelcast/hazelcast/pull/17769/files#diff-424da928c9ab4c6fdd0759ac7859cc93654a0d25c3f9bfcecc930e908b3e23d8R49

commit.message: Add local entry listener with a filter

nodes.bodyText: you can omit <Throwable> here, it's not accurate anyway since we add all kinds of objects to the logCollector.
